articles.title: Watch: Stump mic reveals how Pant's chatter helped Chahal; ‘Dande pe daal yahi’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Chahal picked up three wickets for 60, while Hardik Pandya was the pick of the bowlers with 4/24 – his career-best figures in the 50-over format.
articles.content: A constant chatterbox behind the stumps, Rishabh Pant was his chirpy self when India were one wicket away from dismissing England for 259 in the series-deciding ODI on Sunday. Leg-spinner Yuzvendra C… [+1820 chars]

articles.author: Rob Dawson
articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo could extend Man United contract - Erik ten Hag - ESPN India
articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag has said Cristiano Ronaldo could yet extend his contract at the club.
articles.content:
Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag has said Cristiano Ronaldo could yet extend his contract at the club.

articles.author: Shashank Kishore
articles.title: Rohit pleased with ODI show, but admits India have 'a lot of things to improve' - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Primary among them is the top three of Dhawan, Kohli and Rohit himself, which faltered more often than it did not
